thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Dan Koszowski of Medford.
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Dan Koszowski of Medford.

author: Dan Koszowski of Medford.
title: Dan Koszowski of Medford.
text: This is my 4th auto purchased at Autoleanders and each of my daughters have purchased autos here. We have found the service dept. to do outstanding work. My BMW was purchased at a BMW dealer (autoleanders did not have the same model in stick shift), but I still had it serviced at Autoleanders.
